name: Aura facial
summary: A soothing experience featuring aromatherapy, LED light therapy and sound healing for deep relaxation.
description: A luxurious, sensory experience featuring aromatherapy, deep cleansing, exfoliation, a 15-minute face massage, customized mask, LED therapy, and soothing sound bowl healing for total relaxation and radiant skin.

name: Anti-aging Facial
summary: Firms, smooths, and rejuvenates for youthful, radiant skin.
description: Renew and firm your skin with this rejuvenating treatment that smooths fine lines, boosts collagen, and restores a youthful glow for a radiant, refreshed complexion.

name: HydraFacial
summary: Cleanses, exfoliates, and hydrates for instantly radiant, glowing skin.
description: Deep cleansing treatment, following exfoliation, extracting impurities, whiling hydrating and nourishing. This facial refreshes dull congested skin giving a healthy glow with no downtime.

name: Glass skin facial
summary: A hydrating treatment that smooths, brightens, and plumps the skin for a dewy, glass-like glow.
description: An ultimate glow-enhancing treatment that combines derma planing, an oxygen infusion masque, and LED light therapy. Creating the true "Glass skin" effect.

name: Signature detox facial
summary: Deeply cleanses and purifies to reveal clear, balanced skin.
description: A deep-cleansing treatment featuring steam, exfoliation, extractions, customized masks, and LED light therapy to purify, balance, and restore your skin's natural glow.

name: Lymphatic drainage massage
summary: Reduces puffiness and boosts circulation for a sculpted, lifted look.
description: A relaxing facial massage targeting your lymphatic systems, reducing puffiness, improving circulation, increases blood flow, sculpts and lifts your face, giving you a radiant complexion.

name: Dermaplane
summary: The removal of dead skin and peach fuzz for smoother skin.
description: A gentle exfoliating treatment that removes dead skin cells and peach fuzz. Revealing smoother, brighter skin, enhancing product absorption and creating a great base for makeup.

name: Biorepeel
summary: Exfoliates, brightens, and rejuvenates the skin with very little downtime.
description: An advanced chemical peel that revitalizes the skin by improving texture, minimizing pores, and brightening the complexion with minimal downtime and no peeling

name: Microneedling
summary: Stimulates collagen and elastin production to renew the skin, offering multiple rejuvenating benefits
description: A collagen-boosting treatment that uses fine needles to smooth texture, reduce scars and fine lines, and reveal firmer, more radiant skin

name: Oxygen peel
summary: Detoxifies, brightens, and revitalizes dull, tired skin.
description: A gentle yet powerful oxygen-infused peel that detoxifies, brightens, and revitalizes dull skin while promoting cellular renewal for a healthy, radiant glow.

name: Brow wax + tint
summary: Custom shaping with tint for natural definition.

name: Brow Lamination
summary: Lifted, fuller-looking brows that stay in place.
description: A lifting and setting treatment that transforms unruly brows into structured, polished arches. The process creates the appearance of thicker brows while keeping them perfectly in place for 6–8 weeks.

name: Lash lift + tint
summary: Low‑maintenance curl and depth for natural lashes.

name: Brow Lamination + Lash Lift & Tint
description: Complete transformation combining brow lamination and lash lift for maximum impact.
